info.task: read information about filled in collapsed combobox
info.title: Read information about a filled in, collapsed combobox

setupScript.name: moveFocusToComboboxAndSetValueToAlabama
setupScript.description: sets focus on the Combobox, and sets the combobox value to 'Alabama'

user: With focus on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, read information about the combobox.
instructions.mode: Toggle Quick Nav OFF by pressing the Left Arrow and Right Arrow keys at the same time.

assertions.expectation: Name of the combobox ('State') is conveyed
State of the combobox (collapsed) is conveyed
Text of the selected option ('Alabama') is conveyed
The ability to enter or edit text is conveyed
State of the text in the input (selected) is conveyed
The presence of autocomplete behavior is conveyed
